history.content:
Dear Students;

When posting questions on piazza, please make sure use the tags "EECS" or "CS" if you're asking a specific question advising/policy question that is related to your major. This will not only help advisers provide you with the most accurate information, but will also help others be able to search. I'm also adding a tag for "cs-intended."

In addition, please search for your question first if it's pretty general as someone else may have already asked it/we have already answered it.

Also, please do not simultaneously post a question here and email the same question unless directed by us, as it duplicates our efforts 

Thanks for reading!
history.subject: Please use tags to indicate EECS vs CS advising questions!
